person.persName: Mathias Bryant Swain (Louisville, Kentucky, tailor and merchant)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, tailor and merchant. New Jersey native. Married to Susan Rosette Townley Swain in Fleming County, Kentucky, on June 8, 1853. Father of Deborah A. Swain, Carrie B. Swain, and Kittie Swain. Tailor in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Tailor in Louisville in 1858. Merchant tailor in Louisville in 1860. Tailor in Louisville in 1861. Sewing machine merchant in Henderson County, Kentucky, in 1863.
